Latest News
Conserve initiative comes to Canada
CRFA has partnered with NRA to launch a Canadian version of the Conserve Sustainability Education Program sm –an initiative that helps Canadian restaurant operators become more environmentally friendly in areas ranging from energy use to waste management.
Click here to learn about this initiative.
Canadian restaurateurs more optimistic for 2012
CRFA’s latest Restaurant Outlook Survey for Q1 of 2012 reveals nearly 40% of restaurant owners expect sales to pick up steam over the next six months, and 25% plan to hire more employees.
Click here to read the press release. Click here for the survey results.
I am a Restaurant
The Canadian Restaurant and Foodservices Association proudly presents: I am a Restaurant. This new film tells the story of our industry and the many ways in which restaurants nourish communities across Canada.
